title: change my email
body: can i get  a email change my email was hack and i can not chaange my password my account is legendskiller16 can i get a passcode to change my email

replies.body: We can help!  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team will review your case and update your info.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can!
